books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: When a girl goes missing, a private investigator’s feral childhood becomes an asset in the search.
books.name: THE BOY FROM THE WOODS

books.author: by Anne Tyler
books.description: Micah Mortimer’s orderly existence is thrown off kilter when his partner faces eviction and a teenager claims to be his son.
books.name: REDHEAD BY THE SIDE OF THE ROAD

books.author: by James Patterson and Andrew Holmes
books.description: A former member of the British Special Air Service looks into the death of a young woman in London at her parents’ urging.
books.name: REVENGE

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: Lydia, bearing the hopes of a Chinese-American family in 1970s Ohio, ends up at the bottom of a lake.
books.name: EVERYTHING I NEVER TOLD YOU

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: The stories of three women struggling to get from Louisiana to Texas during Reconstruction are discovered by a first-year teacher living a century later.
books.name: THE BOOK OF LOST FRIENDS

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.
books.name: THE GIVER OF STARS

books.author: by Emily St. John Mandel
books.description: Years after an international Ponzi scheme falls apart, one of its victims investigates the disappearance of a woman from a container ship.
books.name: THE GLASS HOTEL

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: A sibling relationship is impacted when the family goes from poverty to wealth and back again over the course of many decades.
books.name: THE DUTCH HOUSE

books.author: by Elizabeth Wetmore
books.description: A Texas town on the verge of an oil boom in 1976 becomes divided when a teenage girl is brutally attacked.
books.name: VALENTINE

books.author: by James Patterson and Andrew Bourelle
books.description: A Texas Ranger goes to a small town to investigate whether an accidental death was actually a murder.
books.name: TEXAS OUTLAW
